title: Still Life
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Thomas C. Jones, Jr.
provenance_text:
Carl-Henning Pedersen [1913-2007], Copenhagen, Denmark. Mr. and Mrs. Thomas C. Jones, Jr., New York, NY, by April 1969 until October 10, 1974 [1]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1974.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was received at the museum on April 11, 1969 as a loan from Mr. Jones; it was accessioned on October 10, 1974.
